title: Winners : The Other Facts of Life (Captioned)
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Civil rights
description: Episode of Series 'Winners'. Ben can't understand how people can live so happily with the injustice and disaster going on in the world. His family's lack of response leads Ben to mount a one person awareness crusade. Nothing seems to distract Ben from the larger troubles of the world until a crisis causes him to focus his energies on loving and helping his family.
related_objects: Title; 017317; Winners: The Other Facts of Life; Active; 1985
